title: ESA-listed Fish Permit Data Visualization
text:
An interactive web application to display ESA-listed fish permitting data.
Along with the help of my partner, Alana Santana, we created an interactive web application displaying spatial and temporal data on authorized and reported take of ESA-listed fishes using R Shiny and Leaflet.

title: Rory Spurr Data Scientist
text: Hello! My name is Rory, and I enjoy coding and analyzing data! Throughout my life, I have also been interested in marine life and conservation. As an avid fisherman and environmentalist, my goal is to use data to inform on and solve environmental problems.
